SELECT * FROM `user`
AND `userName` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userRealName},'%') AND `merchantType` = 0 OR `merchantType` = null

SELECT `userID`,`userName`,`userRealName`,IF(userSex=1,'男','女') as userSex,userPhone,contactMailbox,userMoney,userIntegral,adDetail,if(merchantType=0,'普通会员',if(merchantType=1,'大陆商家','海外商家')) as merchantType,userRegistrationTime,recentEntry FROM `user`
AND `userName` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userRealName},'%') AND `merchantType` = 0 OR `merchantType` = null

SELECT * FROM `user`
AND `userName` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userRealName},'%') AND `shopName` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%') AND `merchantType` = #{merchantType} AND `merchantType` != 0 and `merchantType` !='null'

SELECT *,(SELECT `name` FROM sharea WHERE areaID=user.liveCityID) AS livecityname, (SELECT stname FROM servicetype WHERE stid=user.firstServiceID) AS firstservicename, (SELECT stname FROM servicetype WHERE stid=user.secondServiceID) AS secondservicename FROM `user`
AND `userName` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') AND `merchantType` = #{merchantType} AND `auditStatus` = #{auditStatus} AND `merchantType` != 0 and `merchantType` !='null'

SELECT *,(SELECT `name` FROM sharea WHERE areaID=user.liveCityID) AS livecityname, (SELECT stname FROM servicetype WHERE stid=user.firstServiceID) AS firstservicename, (SELECT stname FROM servicetype WHERE stid=user.secondServiceID) AS secondservicename FROM `user`
AND `userID`=#{userID}

SELECT serviceType.`stName`,`user`.`userName`,appraisalapply.* FROM `appraisalapply` LEFT JOIN serviceType ON serviceType.stid=appraisalapply.`stid` LEFT JOIN `user` ON `user`.`userID`=appraisalapply.`userID` WHERE applyID=#{applyID}
SELECT IF(firstServiceID=#{stid},'1','2') AS cation FROM `user` WHERE userID=#{userID}
